title: I cannot log in
body:
It says my password is wrong but i am positive that i have never changed it and know what it is.

Maybe someone has hacked my account I honestly have no idea, can I have some help with this please?

replies.body:
If you can't login to your account, first make sure that you're connected to to the correct region.  If it persists then check out the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide for some recovery steps.  

If all else fails, you can hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can help individually.  We'll reply back asap!
i can log into the website but not my client...same boat here guys...even changed my pw and it still wont work. i'm about 1000% done...havent been able to play in weeks.

> [{quoted}](name=Mirelyght,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=12sHlrWT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-04T05:08:36.262+0000)
>
> i can log into the website but not my client...same boat here guys...even changed my pw and it still wont work. i'm about 1000% done...havent been able to play in weeks.

What does it say when you try logging into your client? What ISP do you use?

>
> What does it say when you try logging into your client? What ISP do you use?

just says i have the wrong name/password......i have time warner.
Are you able to on the website?
No, is that a good thing or bad :O
